title: Smart Data Models - ConnectivityNodeContainer
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A base class for all objects that may contain connectivity nodes or topological nodes.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be ConnectivityNodeContainer

ConnectivityNodes.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Connectivity nodes which belong to this connectivity node container. Default: 'list'

TopologicalNode.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The topological nodes which belong to this connectivity node container. Default: 'list'
